DOC.brief_title: Dry v Wet Misoprostol Cervical Dilation First Trimester Abortion
DOC.detailed_description: Misoprostol widely use drug abortion due low cost , stability easy use regimen . Nevertheless , debate whether administration dry misoprostol similar effect compare wet pill . It would necessary undertake clinical trial evaluate regimen ( dry wet ) offer well cervical dilation pre uterine evacuation . The primary objective study compare degree cervical dilatation pre-uterine evacuation subject receive 400 µg dry wet misoprostol 3 hour procedure . Secondary objective verify whether correlation vaginal pH ( < 5 / ≥5 ) degree cervical dilation ( ≥8mm / < 8mm ) use wet dry misoprostol . Women randomize one two group : dry wet misoprostol .
DOC.criteria: Women abortion ( le 12 week pregnancy ) congestive heart failure chronic pulmonary disease hypovolemic shock twin Marfan syndrome septic abortion ( fever , pu , leukocytosis > 14,000 ) know allergy misoprostol blood dyscrasia open cervical ( ≥ 1cm ) use intrauterine device
